title: Mobile Radio Power off/won't turn back on
content:
This past week, whenever my phone has restarted, I would then have no wifi or network access at all. After looking around I managed to get into the phone info service using (*#*#4636#*#*) and I could see that the 'Mobile Radio Power' option was off, I turned it back on and nothing would happen, I then restarted my phone whilst it was on and then all was well. However, today when I try to turn on the mobile radio power, it toggles itself back off almost instantly or if there is a app switch/phone lock. I am now stuck with absolutely no connection to anything at all.

 I have also tried flashing the phone back to android 9 as I thought this could have fixed the issue however I get the same thing

If anyone could shed some light onto the problem i'd greatly appreciate it.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
